address: Xã Chiềng On, Huyện Yên Châu, Tỉnh Sơn La
thought:
**Determining the New Administrative Unit for "Xã Chiềng On"**

Okay, here's how I'd approach this. The user wants to find the new administrative unit for "Xã Chiềng On, Huyện Yên Châu, Tỉnh Sơn La". I'll begin by identifying the province, which is "Tỉnh Sơn La". I know from my experience and understanding of the recent administrative changes in Vietnam, that according to 60-NQ/TW, Sơn La didn't merge with any other province, so that part is simple. The province name remains the same.

Next, I'll focus on the specific ward "Xã Chiềng On". I need to find information about whether it was merged or renamed. I'll search through the relevant resolutions, particularly those related to administrative rearrangements in Sơn La. I'll focus on the "Other resolutions" section, which should contain details of administrative restructuring.

Specifically, I'll examine the resolution 1681/NQ-UBTVQH15, which deals with rearranging administrative units in Sơn La. As I scan through the document, line by line, I'll be meticulously looking for any mention of "Xã Chiềng On". I know how to interpret this kind of resolution - if there is a merger, I'll see clear language indicating which old units are combining to form a new one.

And there it is! In line 41 of the resolution, it explicitly states that "Xã Chiềng On" and "Xã Yên Sơn" were merged to form a new ward called "Xã Yên Sơn". That's a direct hit! I'll make a note of this.

Now, I need to verify that information. I'll double-check this in the "New wards" list for Sơn La to confirm the existence of "Xã Yên Sơn" and its corresponding code. There it is! {"ward_code":"04087","ward_name":"Xã Yên Sơn","province_name":"Tỉnh Sơn La"}.

Based on all this, I am very confident of the answer. "Xã Chiềng On" is now part of "Xã Yên Sơn," with the code "04087". The relevant citation is line 41 of the resolution 1681/NQ-UBTVQH15. I can generate a response with high confidence using this information.

citation.header: 1681/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Sơn La
citation.line: 41. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của xã Chiềng On và xã Yên Sơn thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Yên Sơn.
